query.statement: SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, A.CS126_UPN UPN, A.CS126_CST CST, A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_HNO HNO, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN VALUE(D.CS402_SEQ,'') ELSE B.CS131_SEQ END SEQ, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN VALUE(D.CS402_GND,'') ELSE B.CS131_GND END GND, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN VALUE(D.CS402_ISR,'') ELSE B.CS131_ISR END ISR, B.CS131_MYM MYM, B.CS131_YYM YYM, SUBSTR(B.CS131_YDT,7,2) YDT, B.CS131_AMT AMT, B.CS131_HMT HMT, B.CS131_DMT DMT, 0 VAT, 0 TOT, C.CS136_BAM BAM, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN D.CS402_YYM ELSE B.CS131_YYM END YYM_A, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN D.CS402_YDT ELSE SUBSTR(B.CS131_YDT,7,2) END YDT_A, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN D.CS402_AMT ELSE B.CS131_AMT END AMT_A, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN D.CS402_HMT ELSE B.CS131_HMT END HMT_A, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN D.CS402_DMT ELSE B.CS131_DMT END DMT_A, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN D.CS402_BAM ELSE C.CS136_BAM END BAM_A, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN D.CS402_GBN ELSE '' END GBN, VALUE(D.CS402_RMK,'') RMK, VALUE(D.CS402_PST,'') PST, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') > '' THEN VALUE(D.CS402_GNO,'') ELSE B.CS131_GNO END GNO, VALUE(D.CS402_HIS,'') HIS, CASE WHEN TRIM(A.CS126_KND) > '' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END KND, A.CS126_ABG ABG, SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) HBN, B.CS131_TIS TIS, DECODE(A.CS126_BDGBN,'X','1','') AS BDGBN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZCST131 B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST402 D ON D.MANDT = B.MANDT AND D.CS402_UPN = B.CS131_UPN AND D.CS402_CST = B.CS131_CST AND D.CS402_PJT = B.CS131_PJT AND D.CS402_HNO = B.CS131_HNO AND D.CS402_SEQ = B.CS131_SEQ AND D.CS402_GND = B.CS131_GND AND D.CS402_PYM = B.CS131_MYM AND D.CS402_ISR = B.CS131_ISR AND D.CS402_GNO = #GNO# AND D.CS402_USE = 'Y', SAPHEE.ZCST136 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = B.CS131_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = B.CS131_CST AND A.CS126_PJT = B.CS131_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS131_HNO AND A.CS126_SEQ = B.CS131_SEQ AND A.CS126_GND = B.CS131_GND AND B.CS131_MYB = '' AND B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.CS131_UPN = C.CS136_UPN AND B.CS131_CST = C.CS136_CST AND B.CS131_PJT = C.CS136_PJT AND B.CS131_HNO = C.CS136_HNO AND B.CS131_SEQ = C.CS136_SEQ AND B.CS131_GND = C.CS136_GND AND B.CS131_MYM = C.CS136_JYM AND B.CS131_ISR = C.CS136_ISR AND ((C.CS136_GBU = '1' AND C.CS136_MGB = 'Y') OR (C.CS136_GBU = '3' AND C.CS136_MGB = '')) AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND IN ('C','D') AND A.CS126_GNO = #GNO# -- AND VALUE(D.CS402_USE,'') = 'Y' WITH UR
